attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Electoral voting turnout has been extremely low for the last couple of decades, WHY!.  A lot of people have no confidence in any representative or political party as printed on a ballot form.  Therefore to give everyone an equal voting opportunity the following should be included ballot: -  

‘No confidence what so ever with the current political system’

You never know, if the option was allowed and received enough votes via the ballot form, politicians might wake up and listen to the vast majority, rather than minority.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
